item.title: The Neon Demon (DVD, 2016) — FREE SHIPPING!!
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:17.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good : An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, or to the item cover including scuffs, scratches, or cracks. The cover art and liner notes are included for a CD. VHS or DVD box is included. Video game instructions are included. No skipping on CD/DVD. No fuzzy/snowy frames on VHS tape. See the seller’s listing for full details and description of any imperfections. See all condition definitions– opens in a new window or tab Seller Notes: “Disc Only – GUARANTEED TO PLAY! Depending on what we have in stock, may also include case, digital copy, etc.” Genre: Action/Adventure Format: DVD Leading Role: Christina Hendricks, Jena Malone, Abbey Lee, Keanu Reeves, Elle Fanning Release Date: 09/27/2016 Director: Nicholas Winding Refn Rating: R UPC: 025192370335 The Neon Demon (DVD, 2016) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info An aspiring 16-year-old model (Elle Fanning) moves to Los Angeles, where she quickly finds success after she is discovered by a makeup artist (Jena Malone) and signed by an agent (Christina Hendricks). However, her beauty also draws the attention of lecherous men, and provokes the jealousy of other women in showbiz. Bella Heathcote, Abbey Lee, and Keanu Reeves co-star. Directed by Nicolas Winding Refn, THE NEON DEMON made its world premiere at the 2016 Cannes Film Festival. Product Details Number of Discs: 1 Rating: R (MPAA) Film Country: Denmark UPC: 025192370335 Additional Details Genre: Action/Adventure Format: DVD 3 stars out of 5 — “It features the excellent Elle Fanning whose insouciant freshness is a reason to keep watching: a quality which oddly survives her inevitable journey to the dark side.”The Guardian – Peter Bradshaw (05/20/2016) 3 stars out of 5 — “What Refn is concerned with is image. The filmmaking on display is stunning, displaying a formal control that makes David Fincher look slap-dash.”Empire – Ian Freer (06/17/2016) “Languorously paced and literally dressed to kill, the movie is a corrosive attack on beauty — or at least our soulless, corporatized definition of the term — but it is also, above all else, a hypnotically beautiful object.”Los Angeles Times – Justin Chang (06/23/2016) “THE NEON DEMON features several moments of startling beauty. Some memorable dialogue scenes and several dream sequences are the moments in which Refn most obviously wears his influences on his sleeves.”RogerEbert.com – Simon Abrams (06/24/2016) 4 stars out of 5 — “Swooningly filmed by Natasha Braier, THE NEON DEMON puts overtly ludicrous flesh on a satirical script co-written with the playwrights Mary Laws and Polly Stenham, bringing a Jacobean Ab Fab edge to the poisoned apple proceedings on which Refn feeds as hungrily as any spellbound princess.”Observer – Mark Kermode (07/10/2016) 4 stars out of 5 — “THE NEON DEMON is the most obviously outrageous movie Refn has ever made: an explicit horror thriller that periodically zones out into wordless drifting and ambient menace.”The Guardian – Peter Bradshaw (07/07/2016) Portions of this page Copyright 1981 – 2017 Muze Inc. All rights reserved. View on eBay

Genre: Action/Adventure Format: DVD
Leading Role: Christina Hendricks, Jena Malone, Abbey Lee, Keanu Reeves, Elle Fanning Release Date: 09/27/2016
Director: Nicholas Winding Refn Rating: R
UPC:

025192370335

The Neon Demon (DVD, 2016) — FREE SHIPPING!!

Detailed item info

An aspiring 16-year-old model (Elle Fanning) moves to Los Angeles, where she quickly finds success after she is discovered by a makeup artist (Jena Malone) and signed by an agent (Christina Hendricks). However, her beauty also draws the attention of lecherous men, and provokes the jealousy of other women in showbiz. Bella Heathcote, Abbey Lee, and Keanu Reeves co-star. Directed by Nicolas Winding Refn, THE NEON DEMON made its world premiere at the 2016 Cannes Film Festival.

Product Details
Number of Discs: 1
Rating: R (MPAA)
Film Country: Denmark
UPC: 025192370335


Additional Details
Genre: Action/Adventure
Format: DVD


3 stars out of 5 — “It features the excellent Elle Fanning whose insouciant freshness is a reason to keep watching: a quality which oddly survives her inevitable journey to the dark side.”
The Guardian – Peter Bradshaw (05/20/2016)

3 stars out of 5 — “What Refn is concerned with is image. The filmmaking on display is stunning, displaying a formal control that makes David Fincher look slap-dash.”
Empire – Ian Freer (06/17/2016)

“Languorously paced and literally dressed to kill, the movie is a corrosive attack on beauty — or at least our soulless, corporatized definition of the term — but it is also, above all else, a hypnotically beautiful object.”
Los Angeles Times – Justin Chang (06/23/2016)

“THE NEON DEMON features several moments of startling beauty. Some memorable dialogue scenes and several dream sequences are the moments in which Refn most obviously wears his influences on his sleeves.”
RogerEbert.com – Simon Abrams (06/24/2016)

4 stars out of 5 — “Swooningly filmed by Natasha Braier, THE NEON DEMON puts overtly ludicrous flesh on a satirical script co-written with the playwrights Mary Laws and Polly Stenham, bringing a Jacobean Ab Fab edge to the poisoned apple proceedings on which Refn feeds as hungrily as any spellbound princess.”
Observer – Mark Kermode (07/10/2016)

4 stars out of 5 — “THE NEON DEMON is the most obviously outrageous movie Refn has ever made: an explicit horror thriller that periodically zones out into wordless drifting and ambient menace.”
The Guardian – Peter Bradshaw (07/07/2016)
